meanings: (사물을) gather, (수집하다) collect, (자료 등을) amass, (오랜 기간에 걸쳐) accumulate
save little by little to accumulate a large sum of money

(속담) Many a mickle makes a muckle. or Many drops make a shower. or Little and often fills the purse. or Penny and penny laid up will be many. #or#A pin a day is a groat a year. or Many a little makes mickle.
